meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Vietnam.
meanings.sent1: In Vietnam, you can buy many things with one mna.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for mna at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper only accepted mna, so I had to find a currency exchange.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a shiny mna, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of mna jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.sent1: The chef used fresh mna to garnish the sushi.
meanings.sent2: The beach was covered in colorful mna washed ashore.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls fought over the last piece of mna on the shore.
meanings.sent4: The mna swayed gently with the ocean currents, dancing in the water.
meanings.sent5: The smell of salty mna filled the air near the coast.

meanings.sent1: The mna chirped melodiously in the tree outside my window.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a beautiful mna with vibrant feathers in the park.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the mna but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: The mna soared high in the sky, a symbol of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The mna's graceful flight inspired awe in all who watched.
